Returns:

hasExpired

public boolean hasExpired()
hasExpired returns a boolean value indicating if this cache object has expired or time stamp is before the current time.
Returns:
a boolean value if expired, false otherwise.

refresh

public boolean refresh()
refresh refreshes the contents of this cached object, the data that is cached. The CacheIF object calls this method when the cached object is accessed and the CacheIF object realizes that this cached object has expired or is no longer valid. If the refresh is successful, then the data is returned to the caller requesting the cached information, and the CacheIF object updates the cached object's hit count and last hit time stamp. If the refresh fails, then null is returned to the caller requesting the cached information and the cache object is removed. It is also the responsibility of the refresh method to reset the time to live, expiration of this cached object. Failure to do so will always result in this CacheableIF object being in the state of expiration once the CacheableIF object has expired for the first time. Thus, for all cache purge operations, the refresh method of the CacheableIF object will be called regardless of time to live. Finally, the refresh methods has a responsibility to set the valid flag to true calling the AbstractCacheable.setValid method.

setExpiration

public void setExpiration(long milliseconds)
setExpiration sets the expiration time stamp for the cached object to expire in the cache. If milliseconds is equal to zero, than the cached object will not expire.
Parameters:
long - value indicating the number of milliseconds from now until the cache object will expire
Throws:
Ljava.lang.IllegalArgumentException - object if milliseconds is less than zero.

setExpiration

public void setExpiration(java.util.Date expireTimeStamp)
setExpiration sets the expiration time stamp for the cached object to expire in the cache. If the expireTimeStamp parameter is null, or is before the current time, then the cached object will not expire.
Parameters:
expireTimeStamp:Ljava.util.Date - object specifying the time stamp to expire this cache object.
